item.title: Letting Go
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: The book by David R. Hawkins was a major catalyst for growth for me, and would like to share my thoughts and insights in a series of articles where we will break down the book chapter by chapter. Letting Go - Chapter 1
